title: Animal Health (Destruction of Pigs) (Compensation) Order, 2021
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 81
Gazette dated Friday, 16th April, 2021
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 25 OF 2021
The Animal Health Act, 2010
(Act No. 27 of 2010)
The Animal Health (Destruction of Pigs) (Compensation)
Order, 2021
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 69 of the Animal
Health Act, 2010, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Animal Health (Destruction Title
of Pigs) (Compensation) Order, 2021.
2. (1) An owner of a pig that was slaughtered and destroyed Claim for
compensation
or otherwise disposed of prior to the commencement of this Order
in order to control and eradicate the African Swine Fever outbreak
in Luapula, Muchinga and Northern Provinces in 2017 and 2018,
may claim compensation by submitting to the Director a claim in
the form set out in the Schedule.
(2) An owner of an imported pig is not entitled to claim
compensation if that pig was already diseased or infected with the
African Swine Fever at the time of its importation.
3. The rate of compensation payable for purposes of a claim Rate of
compensation
under paragraph 2(1) is K250.00 for each pig slaughtered and
destroyed or otherwise disposed of.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K8.00 each
